title: Recover from errors
description: Follow this pattern to help users understand and recover from system-level errors.

frontMatter.title: Recover from errors
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to help users understand and recover from system-level errors.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern to structure error messages that help users understand what went wrong and how to resolve the issue. This applies to system-level errors, not inline form field validation.

when_to_use.value: **System-level errors.** When users encounter errors that prevent them from completing a task.
**Clear recovery path.** When you need to explain the problem and provide actionable recovery steps.

design_principles.value: **Two-step structure.** Step 1: Explain the problem. Step 2: Provide recovery steps.
**Keep titles short.** Keep alert titles to 50 characters maximum.
**Use neutral tone.** If user caused error, use neutral tone without blame.
**Be specific and actionable.** Make recovery steps clear, specific, and actionable.
**Coordinate with support.** Coordinate new error messages with Veteran Support team.

examples.title: VA system error
examples.description: Alert explaining a VA system problem with recovery steps.

examples.title: User action error
examples.description: Neutral alert explaining what went wrong with steps to fix.

how_to_build.intro: Error messages follow a two-step structure for clarity.

steps.value: **Step 1 - Explain the problem:** Use alert component with explanation in header.
If VA caused error: 'We're sorry. There's a problem with our system...'
If user caused error: Use neutral tone without blame.
**Step 2 - Provide recovery steps:** Make steps clear, specific, and actionable.
Provide contact option as secondary step if needed.
Include links or buttons when necessary.

frontMatter.code_usage:

| My HealtheVet | MHV Help | 877-327-0022 |

content_considerations.value: Explain what went wrong clearly and specifically.
Tell users how to fix the issue with actionable steps.
Coordinate new error messages with Veteran Support team.

accessibility.value: Alert components must be announced to screen readers immediately.
Links and buttons within error messages must be keyboard accessible.
Contact phone numbers should be formatted for click-to-call on mobile.
